00011 #ifndef __gtx_inverse_inl__
00012 #define __gtx_inverse_inl__

00014 #include "gtx_inverse.h"

00016 namespace glm
00017 {
00018     template <typename T> 
00019     inline _xmat2<T> inverseGTX(const _xmat2<T>& m)
00020     {
00021         T Determinant = m[0][0] * m[1][1] - m[1][0] * m[0][1];
00022 
00023         _xmat2<T> Inverse(
00024             + m[1][1] / Determinant,
00025             - m[1][0] / Determinant,
00026             - m[0][1] / Determinant, 
00027             + m[0][0] / Determinant);
00028 
00029         return Inverse;
00030     }
00031 
00032     template <typename T> 
00033     inline _xmat3<T> inverseGTX(const _xmat3<T>& m)
00034     {
00035         T Determinant = m[0][0] * (m[1][1] * m[2][2] - m[2][1] * m[1][2])
00036                       - m[1][0] * (m[0][1] * m[2][2] - m[2][1] * m[0][2])
00037                       + m[2][0] * (m[0][1] * m[1][2] - m[1][1] * m[0][2]);
00038 
00039         _xmat3<T> Inverse;
00040         Inverse[0][0] = + (m[1][1] * m[2][2] - m[2][1] * m[1][2]);
00041         Inverse[1][0] = - (m[1][0] * m[2][2] - m[2][0] * m[1][2]);
00042         Inverse[2][0] = + (m[1][0] * m[2][1] - m[2][0] * m[1][1]);
00043         Inverse[0][1] = - (m[0][1] * m[2][2] - m[2][1] * m[0][2]);
00044         Inverse[1][1] = + (m[0][0] * m[2][2] - m[2][0] * m[0][2]);
00045         Inverse[2][1] = - (m[0][0] * m[2][1] - m[2][0] * m[0][1]);
00046         Inverse[0][2] = + (m[0][1] * m[1][2] - m[1][1] * m[0][2]);
00047         Inverse[1][2] = - (m[0][0] * m[1][2] - m[1][0] * m[0][2]);
00048         Inverse[2][2] = + (m[0][0] * m[1][1] - m[1][0] * m[0][1]);
00049         Inverse /= Determinant;
00050 
00051         return Inverse;
00052     }
00053 
00054     template <typename T> 
00055     inline _xmat4<T> inverseGTX(const _xmat4<T>& m)
00056     {
00057         T SubFactor00 = m[2][2] * m[3][3] - m[3][2] * m[2][3];
00058         T SubFactor01 = m[2][1] * m[3][3] - m[3][1] * m[2][3];
00059         T SubFactor02 = m[2][1] * m[3][2] - m[3][1] * m[2][2];
00060         T SubFactor03 = m[2][0] * m[3][3] - m[3][0] * m[2][3];
00061         T SubFactor04 = m[2][0] * m[3][2] - m[3][0] * m[2][2];
00062         T SubFactor05 = m[2][0] * m[3][1] - m[3][0] * m[2][1];
00063         T SubFactor06 = m[1][2] * m[3][3] - m[3][2] * m[1][3];
00064         T SubFactor07 = m[1][1] * m[3][3] - m[3][1] * m[1][3];
00065         T SubFactor08 = m[1][1] * m[3][2] - m[3][1] * m[1][2];
00066         T SubFactor09 = m[1][0] * m[3][3] - m[3][0] * m[1][3];
00067         T SubFactor10 = m[1][0] * m[3][2] - m[3][0] * m[1][2];
00068         T SubFactor11 = m[1][1] * m[3][3] - m[3][1] * m[1][3];
00069         T SubFactor12 = m[1][0] * m[3][1] - m[3][0] * m[1][1];
00070         T SubFactor13 = m[1][2] * m[2][3] - m[2][2] * m[1][3];
00071         T SubFactor14 = m[1][1] * m[2][3] - m[2][1] * m[1][3];
00072         T SubFactor15 = m[1][1] * m[2][2] - m[2][1] * m[1][2];
00073         T SubFactor16 = m[1][0] * m[2][3] - m[2][0] * m[1][3];
00074         T SubFactor17 = m[1][0] * m[2][2] - m[2][0] * m[1][2];
00075         T SubFactor18 = m[1][0] * m[2][1] - m[2][0] * m[1][1];
00076 
00077         _xmat4<T> Inverse(
00078             + (m[1][1] * SubFactor00 - m[1][2] * SubFactor01 + m[1][3] * SubFactor02),
00079             - (m[0][1] * SubFactor00 - m[0][2] * SubFactor01 + m[0][3] * SubFactor02),
00080             + (m[0][1] * SubFactor06 - m[0][2] * SubFactor07 + m[0][3] * SubFactor08),
00081             - (m[0][1] * SubFactor13 - m[0][2] * SubFactor14 + m[0][3] * SubFactor15),
00082 
00083             - (m[1][0] * SubFactor00 - m[1][2] * SubFactor03 + m[1][3] * SubFactor04),
00084             + (m[0][0] * SubFactor00 - m[0][2] * SubFactor03 + m[0][3] * SubFactor04),
00085             - (m[0][0] * SubFactor06 - m[0][2] * SubFactor09 + m[0][3] * SubFactor10),
00086             + (m[0][0] * SubFactor13 - m[0][2] * SubFactor16 + m[0][3] * SubFactor17),
00087 
00088             + (m[1][0] * SubFactor01 - m[1][1] * SubFactor03 + m[1][3] * SubFactor05),
00089             - (m[0][0] * SubFactor01 - m[0][1] * SubFactor03 + m[0][3] * SubFactor05),
00090             + (m[0][0] * SubFactor11 - m[0][1] * SubFactor09 + m[0][3] * SubFactor12),
00091             - (m[0][0] * SubFactor14 - m[0][1] * SubFactor16 + m[0][3] * SubFactor18),
00092 
00093             - (m[1][0] * SubFactor02 - m[1][1] * SubFactor04 + m[1][2] * SubFactor05),
00094             + (m[0][0] * SubFactor02 - m[0][1] * SubFactor04 + m[0][2] * SubFactor05),
00095             - (m[0][0] * SubFactor08 - m[0][1] * SubFactor10 + m[0][2] * SubFactor12),
00096             + (m[0][0] * SubFactor15 - m[0][1] * SubFactor17 + m[0][2] * SubFactor18));
00097 
00098         T Determinant = m[0][0] * Inverse[0][0] 
00099                       + m[0][1] * Inverse[1][0] 
00100                       + m[0][2] * Inverse[2][0] 
00101                       + m[0][3] * Inverse[3][0];
00102 
00103         Inverse /= Determinant;
00104         
00105         return Inverse;
00106     }
